title: Side chair
text: Warner Whittier, the first mayor of Haverhill in northeastern Massachusetts from 1870-1871, once owned this side chair.  Its scale, proportion, silhouette, and carved decoration represent the standard attributes associated with chairs made in and around Boston.
description: light wood curved backrest with shell motif at top center; curved front legs; embroidered seat cushion, dark blue with floral medallion in center
creditline: Gift of the John Bradford Davis family
